message.entry: {0} must be a scalar or a 2-element vector.
Specified layer for {0} must be a single layer.
{0} must either be a string, char, or a layer object.
The layer specified for {0} must have a single input and output.
The network specified at the input must be a dlnetwork.
The network specified at the input must have a single output layer.
The specified layer for {0} has errors. Use checkLayer to validate the layer.
The specified layer for {0} must produce an output that has the same size as that of the input.
The dlnetwork specified at the input must have at least one imageInputLayer.
All the imageInputLayers of the dlnetwork specified at the input must have the same number of input channels.
Expected a convolution2dLayer in the penultimate layer of the dlnetwork specified at the input.
The final layer of the input dlnetwork must have a single input and output.
The final layer of the input dlnetwork must produce an output that has the same size as that of the input to that layer.
The input network does not have the minimum number of expected layers. Use pix2pixHDGlobalGenerator to create the input network.
Expected the input dlnetwork to be a scalar object.
